results.name: Expansion of (1-8x^2-24x^3)/((1-2x)^2*(1+2x+4x^2)).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,0,8,-16).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 - 8 x^2 - 24 x^3) / ((1 - 2 x)^2 (1 + 2 x + 4 x^2)), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 08 2016 *)
program: (MAGMA) I:=[1,2,-4,-24]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 2*Self(n-1)+8*Self(n-3)-16*Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 08 2016
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Nov 17 2009
